headerBlock1.title: Making relaxation easier and better
headerBlock1.description: Convenient search and booking of dachas, recreational areas, sanatoriums, hostels, hotels, and tours with quick access to a wide range of options.

headerBlock2.title: Providing fast and practical property search for buying and renting
headerBlock2.description: Ensuring a transparent process with a wide selection by category and comprehensive analysis of all parameters using AI, making each decision well-informed.

headerBlock3.title: Information Portal
headerBlock3.description: A tourism space for travelers, bloggers, and guides.
headerBlock3.description2: A unified space for booking tickets to the latest cultural and entertainment events.
headerBlock3.description3: All about food: gastronomic navigator, online menu, table booking, and delivery.
headerBlock3.description4: Up-to-date news in the field of leisure, tourism, real estate, and transport.

headerBlock4.title: Stay updated with the latest trends with us!
headerBlock4.description: We create engaging content and share useful materials.

mainFirst.title: Wide Range of Services
mainFirst.description: Visitca provides the opportunity to find tourism services, accommodation, and transportation on one platform.

mainSecond.title: Price Comparison
mainSecond.description: The platform offers the ability to compare various services and prices, allowing users to find the best offers on the market.

mainThird.title: User-Friendly Interface
mainThird.description: An intuitive interface and simple navigation ensure a comfortable experience for users on the platform.

mainBottom.title: All for You
mainBottom.description: We offer cashback, discounts, and promotions
mainBottom.description2: for every action in the Visitca super app, making the platform
mainBottom.description3: not only convenient but also beneficial.

cardsTitles.description1: Plan and book your vacation online, wherever you are.
cardsTitles.description2: Resolve any real estate issues online without leaving home.
cardsTitles.description3: Instantly book and buy tickets online anytime.

cardsData.description1: A platform for the community of travelers, bloggers, and guides where you can organize trips together or simply share your experiences and impressions to earn.
cardsData.description2: We develop and expand the area of booking tickets for cultural and entertainment events, including museums, concerts, theaters, cinemas, festivals, and exhibitions, creating a unified space for cultural leisure and recreation.
cardsData.description3: Discover the culinary world with our gastronomic navigator: explore menus, reserve tables, and order delivery conveniently online.
